Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The SendCompletedEventHandler delegate is used to handle events that occur when the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> class finishes asynchronously sending an e-mail message using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> method.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates sending an e-mail message asynchronously. It uses a SendCompletedEventHandler to invoke the `SendCompletedCallback` method to handle <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted> events.
